forest.entrance_message: You enter the lush, green forest. The canopy above filters the sunlight into dancing patterns.

events.name: find_berries
events.message: You stumble upon a bush full of ripe berries!

events.name: find_mushrooms
events.message: You discover some wild mushrooms growing near a fallen log.

events.name: encounter_animal
events.message: A small woodland creature scurries past you.

events.name: nothing
events.message: You explore deeper but find nothing of interest.

climb_tree.name: Climb a tree
climb_tree.description: Climb a tall tree to get a better view
climb_tree.message: You climb a sturdy oak tree and get a bird's eye view of the area.

events.name: spot_cave
events.message: From up here, you can see the entrance to a cave in the distance!

events.name: nice_view
events.message: You enjoy the peaceful view of the forest canopy.

search_for_sticks.name: Search for sticks
search_for_sticks.message: You search the forest floor for sturdy sticks.

events.name: find_stick
events.message: You find a perfect walking stick!

events.name: nothing
events.message: You don't find any suitable sticks.

listen_to_nature.name: Listen to nature
listen_to_nature.description: Stop and listen to the forest sounds
listen_to_nature.message: You stop and listen to the peaceful sounds of the forest.
listen_to_nature.additional_message: Birds chirp overhead, leaves rustle in the breeze, and somewhere in the distance, you hear the sound of running water.
